name: Sakura's Cherry Blossom 2020
additional_info:
A Google Page that will encourage you to study more, work hard, research longer etc. It's very relaxing and calm to browse. 

              It has an image on the main google page; it has an background image as well once you enter search and has his it's own unique background as well in the google images.

Please send feedback guys. It will help us definitely to improve our google page and please kindly share our style to others so they can experience this wonderful style.
